questions.question: What is React primarily used for?
What is the command to create a new React application using Create React App?
Which method in a React component is called after the component is rendered for the first time?
What is the purpose of the useState hook in React?
answers: To fetch data from an API
To handle state in a functional component
questions.correctAnswer: To handle state in a functional component

questions.question: Which of the following is true about React components?
answers: Components must be defined as classes
Components can be either class-based or functional
Components only render on the server side
questions.correctAnswer: Components can be either class-based or functional

questions.question: How do you pass data from a parent component to a child component in React?
What is JSX in React?
answers: A JavaScript extension that allows writing HTML in React
questions.correctAnswer: A JavaScript extension that allows writing HTML in React

questions.question: Which of the following is used to handle side effects in functional components?
What is the purpose of the React key prop?
answers: To uniquely identify elements in an array
questions.correctAnswer: To uniquely identify elements in an array

questions.question: Which of the following methods is used to update the state in a class component?
